Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.events

package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.events
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.controller
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.controller.enums
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Listeners
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BroadcastEvent
    This event contains the message to send in broadcast to clients.
    CharacterParametersEvent
    This event contains the payload of the message from client to server, that contains the player's choice.
    CharacterPlayedEvent
    This event contains the name of the character played by the player.
    CloseConnectionEvent
    This event contains the socket of the rejected player.
    DisconnectionEvent
    This event contains the socketID of the disconnected player, notified by the server ping handler
    IntegerEvent
    This event contains an integer that is the number of mother nature steps, or island's index.
    MessageReceivedEvent
    this event is used to handle ping.
    MoveStudentsEvent
    This event contains the destination of the moveStudents' phase and the student.
    PlanningEvent
    This event contains the index of the assistant played by the player
    PlayCharacterEvent
    This event contains the index of the character played, used to notify controller.
    ReconnectedEvent
    This event contains the socketID of the reconnected player.
    ShowModelEvent
    This event is used to update clients' ModelCache after an action.
    StatusEvent
    This event contains information to send the phase message.
    StringEvent
    This message contains a message to show to the clients.
